data.message: Bahahaha Facebook privacy LOL big brother is always scanning

replies.message: lol, who needs privacy if I'm smart enough to not to share things over internet which are sensitive or personal :D only stupid low IQ plebs sharing personal info and then crying something about big brother :D

^ if you download the app, facebook uploads all that stuff for you automaticly. you wont even know about it unless you read the entire privacy statement and have a law degree...
